Lesson Four Phonics
1 Listen, point, and repeat.  (Âm thanh 36)
  q - queen
  r - rabbit

2 Listen and chant. (Âm thanh 37)

The queen has a question,
About her lost socks.

The rabbit on the sofa says,
"They're right here on these rocks!" 

3 Read the chant again. Say the words with *q*, *r*, and *s*. Write.
4 Listen to the sounds and write the letters. (Âm thanh 38)

Let's talk!
The queen has a question.
